messages.content:
As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: '. I will derive this data from the following paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO POLICE DEPARTMENT
CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION DEPARTMENT
Cybercrime Unit
SIGNAL: 88C
ITEM NUMBER: C-88059-20
PAGE 18 of 50
CASE SUPERVISORS:
Lt. Sarah Nguyen
Sgt. David Brown
CASE INVESTIGATOR:
Det. Ethan Walker
ASSISTING DETECTIVES:
Sgt. Rachel Kim
Sgt. Marcus Lee
( Digital Forensics Unit)
Det. Laura Chen
Det. Alex Ramirez
( Digital Forensics Unit)
Det. Kevin Brooks
( Digital Forensics Unit)
Det. Jessica Hernandez
Det. Ryan Murphy
(General Assignment)
Det. Emily Thompson
(Internet Crimes Section)
Det. Chris Johnson
(Cyber Terrorism Unit)
VICTIM:
JOHN DOE, male, cybersecurity analyst.
DATE, TIME, and
LOCATION of OFFENSE:
03 MARCH 2020 at approximately 8:00 PM in the Financial District.
REPORTING OFFICER:
BADGE:
Det. Ethan Walker
3921
Amidst the investigation, numerous digital footprints and encrypted messages complicated the case. Officer Clark, patrolling the Financial District, was first to report unusual network activity. He was joined by Sgt. Rachel Kim and Patrol Officer Martinez, who helped to isolate the affected network. Technician Patel, with expertise in encryption, worked to decrypt the messages. Criminalist Shaw, examining the digital evidence, found patterns indicating a sophisticated cyber attack. Coroner Dr. Stevens was consulted to examine a body discovered in an unrelated case, which unexpectedly provided leads to the cybercrime. Patrol Officer Davis, collaborating with tech companies in the area, managed to track down digital clues leading to the suspect.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Lt. Sarah Nguyen Officer Context: Supervised the case in the Cybercrime Unit. Officer Role: Lieutenant Officer Name: Sgt. David Brown Officer Context: Co-supervisor of the case with Lt. Nguyen. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Det. Ethan Walker Officer Context: Lead investigator for the cybercrime case, reporting officer. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Sgt. Rachel Kim Officer Context: Assisted in isolating the affected network, part of the Digital Forensics Unit. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Sgt. Marcus Lee Officer Context: Digital Forensics Unit sergeant, supported the operation. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Det. Laura Chen Officer Context: Digital Forensics Unit detective, contributed to the case. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Alex Ramirez Officer Context: Involved in the case, from the Digital Forensics Unit. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Kevin Brooks Officer Context: Digital Forensics Unit detective, assisted in the investigation. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Jessica Hernandez Officer Context: General assignment detective, part of the investigative team. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Ryan Murphy Officer Context: General Assignment detective, assisted in the cybercrime case. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Emily Thompson Officer Context: Internet Crimes Section detective, involved in the investigation. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Chris Johnson Officer Context: Cyber Terrorism Unit detective, contributed to the case. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Officer Clark Officer Context: First to report unusual network activity in the Financial District. Officer Role: Patrolling Officer Officer Name: Patrol Officer Martinez Officer Context: Assisted in isolating the affected network. Officer Role: Patrol Officer Officer Name: Technician Patel Officer Context: Specialized in encryption, worked to decrypt messages. Officer Role: Forensic Technician Officer Name: Criminalist Shaw Officer Context: Analyzed digital evidence, found patterns of a cyber attack. Officer Role: Criminalist Officer Name: Coroner Dr. Stevens Officer Context: Examined a body related to an unrelated case, provided leads to the cybercrime. Officer Role: Medical Examiner Officer Name: Patrol Officer Davis Officer Context: Collaborated with tech companies, tracked down digital clues. Officer Role: Community Relations Officer
